instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2850 backlight turns off halfway through start up
threads.message: Got in a 2850 board that powers on fine back light is good and about halfway through the start up the screens backlight turns off, i think its about where the system is starting to load into the menu and the screen normally blanks for a second and then boot in, but this one just turns off the back light, i have data on the screen with a flashlight.  i have not done any testing yet, wanted to see if anyone has seen this before and what might be causing it? i did replace c9560 from the start.

threads.title: 820-2850 backlight turns off halfway through start up
threads.message: So which signal goes away? BKL_PWM or BKLT_EN? Suspecting the MUX...

threads.title: 820-2850 backlight turns off halfway through start up
threads.message: Okay after a little testing,  i noticed if i don't touch the macbook as it boots up the backlight will not turn off,  but if i bump the macbook or touch t4001 or anywhere on the board the backlight turns off.  After the backlight turns off i get 0v on both BKL_PWM and BKLT_EN.  if i tap the board some more it will not turn back on.

threads.title: 820-2850 backlight turns off halfway through start up
